alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued November 09 at 1:34PM MST until November 09 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Dust Advisory for... South central Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 230 PM MST. * At 132 PM MST, a dust channel was between Eloy and Picacho, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Less than one half mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Detected by National Weather Service meteorologists and ADOT webcams. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 206 and 220. Route 87 between mile markers 116 and 123. Locations impacted include... Eloy, Picacho and Picacho Peak State Park. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
